notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: AV has devised the Safe Stop trial. EM, KJ, SL, BR, PR, SS, JH, and AV have made notable contributions to its conception and design. The role of EM, KJ, AT, KS, MB, GH, JG, AE, MA, DP, RR, EK, GV, FB, EO, MF, SS, JH, and AV is crucial to conduct this clinical trial. EM, KJ, SL, AT, KS, MB, GH, JG, AE, MA, DP, RR, EK, GV, FB, EO, MF, BR, PR, SS, JH, and AV have been involved in drafting the manuscript and revising it critically for important intellectual content. All authors read and approved the final manuscript. Authorships will be defined following the International Committee of Medical Journal Editors guidelines.
